name: Chaos Pinball
description:
You can teach an old game new tricks: each level is faster and more unpredictable.

Bumpers.  Portals. Canons. Magnets. Sometimes all at once. You'll need to adapt on the fly or pay the price.  

Our pinball character mocks you, challenges you, even congratulates you, while the adaptive soundtrack drives the action.  It's never been so much fun to be this out of control!
